author: linconvidal
title: CardaBot: telegram bot with tipping
description: Cardano-related Telegram bots are focused on monitoring. There is no way to tip ada to other users, especially in a non-custodial approach.
solution: A tipping feature for CardaBot, allowing Telegram users to execute ada transactions directly by the bot in a non-custodial approach.
experience: We already have a working product; stake pool operator for +1 year; +6 years of Python development; experience in project management.
